item.title: Introduction to ILCompiler.Reflection.ReadyToRun
item.description: Introduction ILCompiler.Reflection.ReadyToRun.dll is a new library I introduced in late 2019. It is meant to make the data embedded in a ReadyToRun binary available for access. Background What is ReadyToRun? ReadyToRun is a new native compilation technology for .NET Core. For people who know about NGEN, it can be roughly thought as the .NET Core version of NGEN. What is native compilation? When a managed language (such as C#) is compiled, it is compiled into an intermediate language named MSIL.
